courses.title: Guitar Fundamental
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming, and fingerpicking techniques.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: An introductory course to playing the piano, covering basic music theory and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Violin Techniques
courses.description: A comprehensive guide to mastering advanced violin techniques for intermediate players.

courses.title: Drumming Essentials
courses.description: Learn the fundamental skills of drumming, including rhythm patterns and drum kit setup.

courses.title: Singing Masterclass
courses.description: Improve your vocal range, tone, and performance techniques with this singing masterclass.

courses.title: Music Production Basics
courses.description: An introductory course to music production, including mixing, mastering, and using DAWs.

courses.title: Bass Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Learn the essential techniques for playing bass guitar, including slap bass and fingerstyle.

courses.title: Electronic Music Creation
courses.description: Discover how to create electronic music, including beat-making and synthesizer use.

courses.title: Classical Music Theory
courses.description: Understand the foundations of classical music theory, including harmony, melody, and form.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Master the art of jazz improvisation, including scales, chords, and performance tips.

courses.title: Songwriting Techniques
courses.description: Learn the craft of songwriting, including lyric writing, melody creation, and song structure.

courses.title: Orchestral Conducting
courses.description: An in-depth course on conducting orchestras, including techniques and score reading.

courses.title: Ukulele for Beginners
courses.description: A beginner's guide to playing the ukulele, covering basic chords, strumming, and songs.

courses.title: Blues Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Learn the essential techniques of blues guitar, including scales, licks, and improvisation.

courses.title: Flute Fundamentals
courses.description: An introductory course to playing the flute, covering basic techniques and simple pieces.
